BitField.name: OSCPD
BitField.description: Internal 8MHz RC oscillator power down register

BitField.name: TCKCNT
BitField.description: Ticker counter register is used Tick counter of 100usec. for internal timer of TOE. The unit of tick is HCLK. RTR, Sn_RTR, Sn_KATMR operates on the value of this register.

Register.name: PTIMER
Register.description: PPP Link Control Protocol Request Timer Register

BitField.name: PTIME
BitField.description: PTIME configures the time for sending LCP echo request. The unit of time is 25ms

Register.name: PMAGICR
Register.description: PPP Link Control Protocol Magic number Register

BitField.name: PMAGIC
BitField.description: PMAGIC configures the 4bytes magic number to be used in LCP echo request.

Register.name: PHARH
Register.description: Destination Hardware Address Register in PPPoE

Register.name: PHARL
Register.description: Destination Hardware Address Register in PPPoE

BitField.name: PSID
BitField.description: should be written to the PPPoE sever session ID acquired in PPPoE connection process.

Register.name: PMRUR
Register.description: Maximum Receive Unit Register in PPPoE

BitField.name: PMSS0
BitField.description: PMRUR configures the maximum receive unit of PPPoE.

BitField.name: PMSS1
BitField.description: PMRUR configures the maximum receive unit of PPPoE.

BitField.name: SHAR3
BitField.description: SHAR configures the source hardware address

BitField.name: SHAR2
BitField.description: SHAR configures the source hardware address

BitField.name: SHAR1
BitField.description: SHAR configures the source hardware address

BitField.name: SHAR0
BitField.description: SHAR configures the source hardware address

BitField.name: SHAR5
BitField.description: SHAR configures the source hardware address

BitField.name: SHAR4
BitField.description: SHAR configures the source hardware address

BitField.name: SUB3
BitField.description: SUBR configures the subnet mask address.

BitField.name: SUB2
BitField.description: SUBR configures the subnet mask address.

BitField.name: SUB1
BitField.description: SUBR configures the subnet mask address.

BitField.name: SUB0
BitField.description: SUBR configures the subnet mask address.

BitField.name: SIP3
BitField.description: SIPR configures the source IP address

BitField.name: SIP2
BitField.description: SIPR configures the source IP address

BitField.name: SIP1
BitField.description: SIPR configures the source IP address

BitField.name: SIP0
BitField.description: SIPR configures the source IP address

BitField.name: RT
BitField.description: RTR configures the retransmission timeout period

BitField.name: RC
BitField.description: RC configures the number of time of retransmission

RegisterGroup.name: TOE_Socket0
RegisterGroup.description: Tcp/ip core Offload Engine Socket0 register

BitField.name: MODE
BitField.description: These bits configures the protocol mode

BitField.name: NDA
BitField.description: Use No Delayed ACK, Multicast and Multicast Blocking mode

BitField.name: BB
BitField.description: Broadcast Blocking in MACRAW and UDP mode

BitField.name: MACFEN
BitField.description: Multicasting and MAC Filter Enable mode

BitField.name: CMD
BitField.description: This is used to set the command for Socket n

BitField.name: CONNECT
BitField.description: This is issued one time when the connection with peer is successful and then Sn_SR is changed to SOCK_ESTABLISHED

BitField.name: DISCONNECT
BitField.description: This is issued when FIN or FIN/ACK packet is received

BitField.name: RECV
BitField.description: his is issued whenever data is received from a peer

BitField.name: TIMEOUT
BitField.description: This is issued when ARPTO or TCPTO occurs

BitField.name: SENDOK
BitField.description: This is issued when SEND command is completed

BitField.name: SR
BitField.description: SR indicates the status of Socket n

BitField.name: PNR
BitField.description: This IP Protocol Register is user to set up the Protocol Field of IP Header at the IP layer RAW mode

Register.name: Sn_TOSR
Register.description: Socket n IP Type of Service Register

BitField.name: TOS
BitField.description: TOS configures the TOS(Type Of Service field in IP Header) of Socket n

BitField.name: TTL
BitField.description: TTL configures the TTL(Time To Live field in IP Header) of Socket n

BitField.name: Sn_FRAG
BitField.description: Sn_FRAG configures the FRAG(Fragment field in IP header)

BitField.name: Sn_MSS
BitField.description: This register is used for MSS (Maximum Segment Size) of TCP, and the register displays MSS set by the other party when TCP is activated in Passive Mode

BitField.name: Sn_PORT
BitField.description: Sn_PORTR configures the source port number of Socket n

Register.name: Sn_DHARH

RegisterGroup.name: TOE_Socket1
RegisterGroup.description: Tcp/ip core Offload Engine Socket1 register

BitField.name: MODE
BitField.description: These bits configures the protocol mode

BitField.name: NDA
BitField.description: Use No Delayed ACK, Multicast and Multicast Blocking mode

BitField.name: BB
BitField.description: Broadcast Blocking in MACRAW and UDP mode

BitField.name: MACFEN
BitField.description: Multicasting and MAC Filter Enable mode

BitField.name: CMD
BitField.description: This is used to set the command for Socket n

BitField.name: CONNECT
BitField.description: This is issued one time when the connection with peer is successful and then Sn_SR is changed to SOCK_ESTABLISHED

BitField.name: DISCONNECT
BitField.description: This is issued when FIN or FIN/ACK packet is received

BitField.name: RECV
BitField.description: his is issued whenever data is received from a peer

BitField.name: TIMEOUT
BitField.description: This is issued when ARPTO or TCPTO occurs

BitField.name: SENDOK
BitField.description: This is issued when SEND command is completed

BitField.name: SR
BitField.description: SR indicates the status of Socket n

BitField.name: PNR
BitField.description: This IP Protocol Register is user to set up the Protocol Field of IP Header at the IP layer RAW mode

Register.name: Sn_TOSR
Register.description: Socket n IP Type of Service Register

BitField.name: TOS
BitField.description: TOS configures the TOS(Type Of Service field in IP Header) of Socket n

BitField.name: TTL
BitField.description: TTL configures the TTL(Time To Live field in IP Header) of Socket n

BitField.name: Sn_FRAG
BitField.description: Sn_FRAG configures the FRAG(Fragment field in IP header)

BitField.name: Sn_MSS
BitField.description: This register is used for MSS (Maximum Segment Size) of TCP, and the register displays MSS set by the other party when TCP is activated in Passive Mode

BitField.name: Sn_PORT
BitField.description: Sn_PORTR configures the source port number of Socket n

BitField.description: Sn_DHAR configures the destination hardware address of Socket n when using SEND_MAC command in UDP mode

BitField.name: DHAR2
BitField.description: Sn_DHAR configures the destination hardware address of Socket n when using SEND_MAC command in UDP mode

BitField.name: DHAR1
BitField.description: Sn_DHAR configures the destination hardware address of Socket n when using SEND_MAC command in UDP mode

BitField.name: DHAR0
BitField.description: Sn_DHAR configures the destination hardware address of Socket n when using SEND_MAC command in UDP mode

Register.name: Sn_DHAWR
Register.description: Socket n Destination Hardware address Register

BitField.name: DHAR5
BitField.description: Sn_DHAR configures the destination hardware address of Socket n when using SEND_MAC command in UDP mode

BitField.name: DHAR4
BitField.description: Sn_DHAR configures the destination hardware address of Socket n when using SEND_MAC command in UDP mode

Register.name: Sn_DHARR
Register.description: Socket n Destination Hardware address Register

BitField.name: DHAR5
BitField.description: Sn_DHAR configures the destination hardware address of Socket n when using SEND_MAC command in UDP mode

BitField.name: DHAR4

Register.name: Sn_DPORTR
Register.description: Socket n Destination Port Number Register

BitField.name: Sn_DPORT
BitField.description: Sn_DPORT configures or indicates the destination port number of Socket n

Register.name: Sn_DIPR
Register.description: Socket n Destination IP address Register

BitField.name: DIP3
BitField.description: Sn_DIPR configures or indicates the destination IP address of Socket n

BitField.name: DIP2
BitField.description: Sn_DIPR configures or indicates the destination IP address of Socket n

BitField.name: DIP1
BitField.description: Sn_DIPR configures or indicates the destination IP address of Socket n

BitField.name: DIP0
BitField.description: Sn_DIPR configures or indicates the destination IP address of Socket n

Register.name: Sn_KATMR
Register.description: Socket n Keep Alive Timer Register

BitField.name: Sn_KATM
BitField.description: Sn_KATM configures the transmitting timer of ‘KEEP ALIVE(KA)’ packet of SOCKETn

BitField.name: RT
BitField.description: RT configures the retransmission timeout period of Socket n

BitField.name: RC
BitField.description: RC configures the number of time of retransmission of Socket n

Register.name: Sn_TXBUF_SIZE
Register.description: Socket n TX Buffer Size Register

BitField.name: TMS
BitField.description: TMS configures the TX Buffer size of Socket n

Register.name: Sn_TX_FSR
Register.description: Socket n TX Free Size Register

BitField.name: FS
BitField.description: FS indicates the free size of Socket n TX Buffer

Register.name: Sn_TX_RD
Register.description: Socket n TX Read Pointer Register

Register.name: Sn_TX_WR
Register.description: Socket n TX Write Pointer Register

Register.name: Sn_RXBUF_SIZE
Register.description: Socket n RX Buffer Size Register

Register.name: Sn_RX_RSR
Register.description: Socket n RX Received Size Register

BitField.name: RX_RS
BitField.description: RX_RS indicates the data size received and saved in Socket n RX Buffer

Register.name: Sn_RX_RD
Register.description: Socket n RX Read Pointer Register

Register.name: Sn_RX_WR
Register.description: Socket n RX Write Pointer Register

RegisterGroup.name: TOE_Socket6
RegisterGroup.description: Tcp/ip core Offload Engine Socket6 register

BitField.name: MODE
BitField.description: These bits configures the protocol mode

BitField.name: NDA
BitField.description: Use No Delayed ACK, Multicast and Multicast Blocking mode

BitField.name: BB
BitField.description: Broadcast Blocking in MACRAW and UDP mode

BitField.name: MACFEN
BitField.description: Multicasting and MAC Filter Enable mode

BitField.name: CMD
BitField.description: This is used to set the command for Socket n

BitField.name: CONNECT
BitField.description: This is issued one time when the connection with peer is successful and then Sn_SR is changed to SOCK_ESTABLISHED

BitField.name: DISCONNECT
BitField.description: This is issued when FIN or FIN/ACK packet is received

BitField.name: RECV
BitField.description: his is issued whenever data is received from a peer

BitField.name: TIMEOUT
BitField.description: This is issued when ARPTO or TCPTO occurs

BitField.name: SENDOK
BitField.description: This is issued when SEND command is completed

BitField.name: SR
BitField.description: SR indicates the status of Socket n

BitField.name: PNR
BitField.description: This IP Protocol Register is user to set up the Protocol Field of IP Header at the IP layer RAW mode

Register.name: Sn_TOSR
Register.description: Socket n IP Type of Service Register

BitField.name: TOS
BitField.description: TOS configures the TOS(Type Of Service field in IP Header) of Socket n

BitField.name: TTL
BitField.description: TTL configures the TTL(Time To Live field in IP Header) of Socket n

BitField.name: Sn_FRAG
BitField.description: Sn_FRAG configures the FRAG(Fragment field in IP header)

BitField.name: Sn_MSS
BitField.description: This register is used for MSS (Maximum Segment Size) of TCP, and the register displays MSS set by the other party when TCP is activated in Passive Mode

BitField.name: Sn_PORT
BitField.description: Sn_PORTR configures the source port number of Socket n

Register.name: Sn_DHARH
Register.description: Socket n Destination Hardware address Register

BitField.name: DHAR3
BitField.description: Sn_DHAR configures the destination hardware address of Socket n when using SEND_MAC command in UDP mode

Register.name: AIRCR
Register.description: Application interrupt and reset control register

BitField.name: RELOAD
BitField.description: Value to load into the SYST_CVR when the counter is enabled and when it reaches 0

BitField.name: CURRENT
BitField.description: The current value of the SysTick counter

BitField.name: NOREF
BitField.description: Indicates whether the device provides a reference clock to the processor

BitField.name: SKEW
BitField.description: Indicates whether the TENMS value is exact

BitField.name: TENMS
BitField.description: Reload value for 10ms (100Hz) timing, subject to system clock skew errors
